ygData.subject: WAHOO!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it seems that my dreams of actually playinf EQ again may happen a lot sooner than I had expected! I finally got the money I was waiting for so I put my
ygData.messageBody:
Well it seems that my dreams of actually playinf EQ again may happen
a lot sooner than I had expected! I finally got the money I was
waiting for so I put my deposit down for the on-campus apartments. It
seems that there may be an opening by the end of this month if I want
it. (Yah like that's a question to ask me! Do I want it?! Yup you
betcha!) So keep your fingers crossed that I can actually move on
campus by the end of this month cause if I do...well...I'll be
playing by the middle of next month. *sigh* the last few weeks are
the hardest to wait for! The Raven
